attributes.action: use the police force to prosecute drivers using just the motorway middle lane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The motorway system is becoming increasingly clogged by thoughtless drivers who think it is their right to occupy the middle lane. This is dangerous in that it forces drivers into the outside lane, causes congestion because drivers bunch up behind them, and effectively reduces a 3 lane motorway to a 2 lane motorway

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
